messages.title: LD SAYS:
messages.content: Only Labour can take on the SNP in Aberdeen North.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Even when the SNP can win here, the local elections finished third behind Labour.

issues.economy: On jobs and public services in Aberdeen

leaflet.personalStatement: Orr is counting on your support to stand up for Aberdeen North, not for another independence referendum.

images.caption: Orr Vinegold is counting on your support to stand up for Aberdeen North, not for another independence referendum.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on the tactical situation in Aberdeen North and emphasizes the Labour Party as the alternative to the SNP, with specific opposition to another independence referendum.
